Item.name: Powered X-ORCA Helmet (Light/Visor Guard/Adv.Rebreather/Red)
Item.description: An O.R.C.A Helmet with an Internal Power Source and Headlamp. This Helmet utilizes an Advanced Integrated Subcompact Computer Controlled CCR, allowing Oxygen Sources to last for a very long time.
